title: Fade to Love
description: Tony Jacobs is one of Hollywood’s hottest film stars. Sara Maven is starring in a television series when she lands the role of Tony’s love interest in his next movie. Tony is interested in Sara from the moment he sees her. Sara, also drawn to Tony, is well aware of his reputation as a player. Both have backgrounds that have made them wary of relationships. But when Tony and their director are kidnapped during filming, true feelings emerge. Fade to Love follows Tony and Sara as they face love, loss and danger. Approximately 35,000 words.
author: Allyson Simonian
